summary: Implements an Ansible action plugin that gathers file fragments from a source directory, concatenates them (optionally with a delimiter), computes checksums, and delegates the resulting assembled content to the appropriate Ansible module for remote deployment, handling idempotency, backups, permissions, and error reporting.
business_intent: Enable automated, reliable assembly of distributed configuration or script fragments into a single file on managed hosts as part of infrastructure provisioning and configuration management workflows.
